name: MIS PIU Prisoner Financial History
description:
Lists the opening and closing balances and all transactions for a prisoner for a date range defined at runtime.
POL0005 - v00.00.01 Last Modified: 17/12/13

dataset.name: Balance
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_NAME, SUM(COALESCE(CASE WHEN NOT AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK IS NULL THEN AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.GROSS_BALANCE END, 0)) AS SUM_OF_ACCOUNT_OPENING_BALANCE FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.BALANCE_DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND ((AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE = (SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter Start Date','D',,mono,free,Not_Persistent) */)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = (SELECT PRISONER_NUMBER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter NOMS Number',,,mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:1) */)) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE IN (2101, 2102, 2103))) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_NAME), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FIRST_NAME, SURNAME, ACCOUNT_NAME, SUM_OF_ACCOUNT_OPENING_BALANCE, 'TBD' AS V_RUNNING_BALANCE, ACCOUNT_NAME AS V_ACCOUNT_NAME_, 'TBD' AS V_OPENING_BALANCE_TEXT, 'TBD' AS V_CLOSING_BALANCE_TEXT FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Transactions
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME ELSE TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME) - 1 / 86400 END AS BUSINESS_DATE_AND_TIME, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_NAME, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE) = 'CR' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END) AS CREDIT_AMOUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE) = 'DR' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END) AS DEBIT_AMOUNT, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ID FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_CASELOADS, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN, BODIMIS.DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_BUSINESS_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK = AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK) AND (BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC_SK) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (((AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE) BETWEEN ((SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter Start Date','D',,mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:101) */)) AND ((SELECT END_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter End Date','D',,mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:102) */))) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = (SELECT PRISONER_NUMBER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter NOMS Number',,,mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:1) */)) AND (AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE IN (2101, 2102, 2103))) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME ELSE TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME) - 1 / 86400 END, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_NAME, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ID), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FIRST_NAME, SURNAME, BUSINESS_DATE_AND_TIME, DESCRIPTION, TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC, ACCOUNT_NAME, CREDIT_AMOUNT, DEBIT_AMOUNT, TXN_ID, 'TBD' AS V_RUNNING_BALANCE, ACCOUNT_NAME AS V_ACCOUNT_NAME_, 'TBD' AS V_OPENING_BALANCE_TEXT, 'TBD' AS V_CLOSING_BALANCE_TEXT FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Account Names
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_NAME FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS WHERE (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE IN (2101, 2102, 2103))), dataset_ AS (SELECT ACCOUNT_NAME FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:V_RUNNING_BALANCE
field.legacySql: =[Sum of Account Opening-Balance] + RunningSum([Credit Amount]-[Debit Amount];FORCE_COL;([Transactions].[NOMS Number];[Account Name]))+0

field.name: $ref:V_OPENING_BALANCE_TEXT
field.legacySql: ="Opening "+[v_Account Name (Section)]+" Balance as at "+ToDate(Left(UserResponse([Transactions];"Enter Start Date");10);"dd/MM/yyyy")

field.name: $ref:V_CLOSING_BALANCE_TEXT
field.legacySql: ="Closing "+[v_Account Name (Section)]+" Balance as at "+ToDate(Left(UserResponse([Transactions];"Enter End Date");10);"dd/MM/yyyy")

field.name: $ref:V_RUNNING_BALANCE
field.legacySql: =[Sum of Account Opening-Balance] + RunningSum([Credit Amount]-[Debit Amount];FORCE_COL;([Transactions].[NOMS Number];[Account Name]))+0
